address.description: An address that can be used within the Andromeda ecosystem. Inspired by the cosmwasm-std `Addr` type. This address can be one of two things: 1. A valid human readable address e.g. `cosmos1...` 2. A valid Andromeda VFS path e.g. `/home/user/app/component` VFS paths can be local in the case of an app and can be done by referencing `./component` they can also contain protocols for cross chain communication.
address.title: Address

address.ui:description: Enter a valid Andromeda address to check the balance. This can be a human-readable address or a VFS path for cross chain communication.
